title: Best of the Program | Guests: Ezra Levant & Bill O'Reilly | 2/18/22
description:
Rebel News founder Ezra Levant joins Glenn to discuss the latest on Canada’s attack on the Freedom Convoy and how it can affect Americans. Bill O’Reilly joins to for his weekly news recap, discussing Canada and the economy. Head writer and chief researcher for Glenn Beck Jason Buttrill joins Glenn and Stu to discuss the Russia-Ukraine controversy.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
